rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: his teaching style is a bit difficult to get used to but it's definitely manageable. there's a lot of reading that should be done for homework and it's important to not get behind. very interesting class and content. you definitely can't miss class (he's pretty strict about attendance).

Assigns ridiculous amounts of reading, especially for a 100 level class. I've been in college for years and have never had to do this much reading. He is a very good lecturer and encourages his students to think and discuss the themes found in the reading, though you will mostly be discussing that at recitation if you're in a large lecture class.
